clip.errorQueue: Can't play clip because there is an active queue.

lyrics.description: Get lyrics for the currently playing song

move.description: Move songs around in the queue

play.description: Plays audio from YouTube or Soundcloud
play.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
play.errorNotInSameChannel: You must be in the same channel as {user}
play.usageReply: Usage: {prefix}play <YouTube URL | Video Name | Soundcloud URL>
play.missingPermissionConnect: Cannot connect to voice channel, missing permissions
play.missingPermissionSpeak: I cannot speak in this voice channel, make sure I have the proper permissions!
play.queueAdded: ‚úÖ **{title}** has been added to the queue by <@{author}>
play.decreasedVolume: <@{author}> üîâ decreased the volume, the volume is now {volume}%
play.increasedVolume: <@{author}> üîä increased the volume, the volume is now {volume}%

playlist.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
playlist.errorNotInSameChannel: You must be in the same channel as {user}
playlist.missingPermissionConnect: Cannot connect to voice channel, missing permissions
playlist.missingPermissionSpeak: I cannot speak in this voice channel, make sure I have the proper permissions!
playlist.prompt: Please send a YouTube playlist link
playlist.notPlaylist: Hmm that doesn't seem like a playlist url

pruning.errorWritingFile: There was an error writing to the file.

queue.description: Show the music queue and now playing.
queue.missingPermissionMessage: Missing permission to manage messages or add reactions

search.description: Search and select videos to play
search.errorAlreadyCollector: A message collector is already active in this channel.
search.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!

skip.errorNotQueue: There is nothing playing that I could skip for you.

skipto.description: Skip to the selected queue number
skipto.errorNotValid: The queue is only {length} songs long!

volume.description: Change volume of currently playing music
volume.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
volume.errorNotNumber: Please use a number to set volume.

common.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
common.cooldownMessage: please wait {time} more second(s) before reusing the `{name}` command.
common.errorCommand: There was an error executing that command.
common.channelOnly: This command can only be used in <#{channel}>
common.missingPerms: You don't have permission to do that
common.noSetup: You need to run {prefix}setup before you can use this command

kick.description: Kicks a member from the discord server
kick.prompt: Please specify a member to kick
kick.fail: I cannot kick {member}, they are too powerful!

status.noType:
That activity type is not valid.
Please use one of the following: PLAYING, STREAMING, LISTENING, WATCHING, COMPETING
